title: Adikts
overview: Max, Mell, Ema, Robin and Sonia. As part of a responsible approach to their studies, five addictionology students decide on an experiment - to take drugs that could temporarily solve the problems of each of them. As Professor Jensen says, drugs are shortcuts to solving problems. But the experiment has one significant catch. The effect of the drugs will become permanent for everyone. Fun and newly acquired "superpowers" lead the young heroes to the edge of their possibilities, but also of their strength. And all this in a situation where the function of a drug coordinator has been established in the country, which approaches the drug problem with maximum severity...
